Waltham.House at 307 Lexington Street: The House at 307 Lexington Street in Newton, Massachusetts, is a well-preserved small-scale Greek Revival house. The ​1 3⁄4-story wood-frame house was built c. 1860, and has a steeply pitched gable roof with paired gable dormers on the side, and a round-arch window at the top of the gable (an Italianate feature).
